original_title: Fixer: The Taking of Ajmal Naqshbandi
overview: In 2007, the Taliban kidnapped 24-year-old Ajmal Naqshbandi and an Italian journalist. Naqshbandi was one of Afghanistan's best "fixers" -- someone hired by foreign journalists to facilitate, translate, and gain access for their stories.
title: Fixer: The Taking of Ajmal Naqshbandi
